casebody.data:
No. 306,

Mise.

Hashfield v. Circuit Court of Monroe County et al. Ferdinand Samper for petitioner. John J. Dillon, Attorney General of Indiana, Douglas B. McFadden, Assistant Attorney General, and Duejean C. Garrett, Deputy Attorney General, for respondents.

Sup. Ct. Ind. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted.
